[docs]def col_sumsq(X):
    return (X ** 2).sum(axis=1)




[docs]def hstack(x, p):
    return np.outer(x, np.ones(p, dtype=bool))




[docs]def vstack(x, n):
    return np.outer(np.ones(n, dtype=bool), x)




[docs]def center_matrix(Y):
    return Y - vstack(Y.mean(axis=0), Y.shape[0])
